test_description: Verify that prompts with bypass prefixes are not enhanced by the Prompt Improver system

tests.expected_behavior: No enhancement, original prompt passes through
tests.actual_result: PASS - Bypass prefix 'raw:' correctly prevents enhancement
tests.notes: The 'raw:' prefix successfully bypassed the enhancement system

tests.expected_behavior: No enhancement, original SQL query passes through
tests.actual_result: PASS - Bypass prefix 'exact:' correctly prevents enhancement
tests.notes: The 'exact:' prefix successfully bypassed the enhancement system for SQL queries

tests.actual_result: PASS - Commands starting with '/' are not enhanced
tests.notes: System commands are correctly excluded from enhancement

tests.expected_behavior: No enhancement, original prompt passes through
tests.actual_result: PASS - Bypass prefix 'no-enhance:' correctly prevents enhancement
tests.notes: The 'no-enhance:' prefix successfully bypassed the enhancement system

summary.conclusion: All bypass mechanisms are working correctly. The Prompt Improver system properly recognizes and respects all tested bypass prefixes, allowing original prompts to pass through without enhancement.

implementation_notes.bypass_detection: The system correctly identifies bypass prefixes at the beginning of prompts
implementation_notes.command_exclusion: Commands starting with '/' are automatically excluded from enhancement
implementation_notes.prefix_handling: After detecting a bypass prefix, the system removes it and passes the remaining content unchanged
implementation_notes.no_side_effects: No enhancement notices or processing indicators appear when bypass is active
